full_title: Guy For That by Post Malone (Ft. Luke Combs)
title: Guy For That

description.plain:
“Guy For That” marks Post Malone and Luke Combs’ first collaboration together, and Posty’s third single expected to be included on F-1 Trillion, which is set to release on August 16th.

Post Malone first teased this song on February 15th via Instagram. He later posted a slightly longer snippet of the single via his Instagram on July 23rd, and officially released it everywhere on July 26th.

Similar to his past two releases, Post Malone takes turns trading verses with Luke Combs over a classic feel good country instrumental.

The pair use irony to describe how they both have someone to fix all their other problems, but are unfortunately left to their own devices when it comes to fixing a broken relationship.

embed_content: Read “Guy For That” by Post Malone on Genius
